component.name: Al Quran (Tafsir & By Word)
component.summary: Study the Quran through Word by Word Analysis, Colored Tajweed, Tafsir & Audio

description.p:
Start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!
Alhamdulillah! Introducing Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word), the ultimate Quran study tool for all. With features such as a robust audio system with repeat functions to aid in Quran hifz, word-by-word analysis and translations, Tafsir Ibn Kathir, colour-coded tajweed, Quran topics list, bookmark and note-taking with sync, a powerful search, and multiple translations and tafsirs in various languages, this app is packed with everything you need to deepen your understanding of the Quran. Download now and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran with the Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word).

You can Enjoy:
Several Translations & Tafsirs
● Understand the Quran by studying 90+ Translations & Tafsirs of the Quran in 60+ languages: Bangla, Chinese, English, French, Hindi, German, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Urdu and many more!
● Study Tafsir Ibn Kathir in multiple languages
● 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari, etc.) along with Arabic E3rab, Word Meaning, Asabun Nuzool
● Study different Translations & Tafsirs simultaneously
Word by Word Analysis & Translations
● Read Word by Word translations of the Quran in Bangla, English, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Ingush, Malay, Russian, Tamil, Turkish and Urdu
● Study and Analyse Word by Word Root / Lemma Information, Grammar Details and Verb Forms to dive in more depth. Helpful to learn & understand Arabic
● Check the occurrences of the word, root and lemma in different forms

Bookmarks
● Bookmark ayahs to your own Collections and keep track of the last read ayah using Pins
● Start reading from where you left off using automatic Last Reads
Search & Quran Index
● Powerful Search with Highlights
● Surah Search along with advanced search tips to quickly find what you are looking for
● Explore by Topics & read all ayahs related to a topic together

Quran Audio
● Listen to several recitations by 30+ reciters (downloadable for offline use)
● Reciter Options: Sheikh Mishary Al Afasy, Sheikh Husary (Muallim), Shaykh Ayman Suwaid, Sheikh Abdur Rahman As-Sudais and many others
● Robust Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorization / Quran Hifz
● Reciters tagged based on recitation types: Murattal, Mujawwad, WBW, Translation
● English Quran Audio Translation and Arabic Audio Commentary

● Word by Word Audio Playback
Various Customization Options & Others
● Read in Uthmanic / Indopak script
● Read Tafsirs in Tafsir view
● Recite Tajweed colour-coded Quran with ease
● Quran Dictionary
● Various fonts and multiple themes, including Night mode
● Autoscroll feature
● Copy & Share the verses

Localization
● Quran App User Interface localized in 20+ Languages: Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu, and more
● All feature supports offline (Quran offline)
● And the next features that are in development
Download now and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!
Share and recommend this beautiful Quran app to your friends and family. May Allah bless us in this world and hereafter.
